    • Method Detail

      • liveMigrateQemuVM

        public static boolean liveMigrateQemuVM(java.lang.String sourceIP,
                        java.lang.String destIP,
                        java.lang.String vmDomain)
        Use the libvirt Java api to live miration a VM. Polls every second until the migration is finished. Currently, only QEMU/KVM VMs are supported and only connections over ssh are supported. Note: the linux user that is running this class must have an ssh key shared with the source and destination hypervisors and the keys of the hypervisors must have been accepted by this user. This is so that this program can log into the hypervisors without a password.
        Parameters:
        sourceIP - The source hypervisor ip address
        destIP - The destination hypervisor ip address
        vmDomain - The libvirt domain to migrate
        Returns:
        True if the vm was successfully migrated, False otherwise

      • checkDomain

        public static boolean checkDomain(java.lang.String hostIp,
                  java.lang.String domain)
        Check if a given libvirt domain exists on given libvirt hypervisor
        Parameters:
        hostIp - String ip address of the libvirt hypervisor
        domain - String libvirt domain of the vm to be checked
        Returns:
        boolean true if the vm exists, false if not or an error is encountered
